languages.text: "Потому что без покровительства вашего сенешаля этот род — слабейший из всех на Даргонусе. И вдобавок пользуется особой неприязнью губернаторского семейства. Похоронить семью Версериан под обвинениями в ереси было проще всего".

"Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."
languages.original_text: "Потому что без покровительства вашего сенешаля этот род — слабейший из всех на Даргонусе. И вдобавок пользуется особой неприязнью губернаторского семейства. Похоронить семью Версериан под обвинениями в ереси было проще всего".

traits.locale_text: "Because if not for the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on the entire Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserian family with the accusations of heresy."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Because if not for the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on the entire Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserian family with the accusations of heresy."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Because if it was not for the Seneschal's protection, this house would be the weakest one on the entire Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserian family with the accusations of heresy."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Because if it was not for the Seneschal's protection, this house would be the weakest one on the entire Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserian family with the accusations of heresy."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: 「家令長という保護壁を失えば、あの家はダルゴナス中で最弱だからよ。総督家には特に嫌われているというのも、ちょうどよかった。ウェルザリアン一族を異端の告発で葬るなんて簡単だったはずなのに」
languages.original_text: "Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「家令長という保護壁がなければ、あの家はダルゴナス中で最弱だからよ。総督家には特に嫌われているというのも、ちょうどよかった。ウェルザリアン一族を異端の告発で葬るなんて簡単だったはずなのに」
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: “因为一旦失去了阿贝拉德的保护，韦尔森家族就是整个达戈努斯最不堪一击的贵族。况且，总督的家族本来就与韦尔森家族摩擦不断，只要随便安个异端罪名，就足以轻松除掉他们。”
languages.original_text: "Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."

traits.locale_text: “因为如果不是因为阿贝拉德的保护，韦尔森家族本就是达戈努斯最不堪一击的贵族。况且，总督的家族本来就与韦尔森家族摩擦不断，只要随便安个异端罪名，就足以轻松除掉他们。”
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: « Parce que cette maison est la plus faible de Dargonus, et sans la protection du sénéchal, elle aurait disparu depuis longtemps. La famille du gouverneur ne la porte pas non plus dans son cœur. Une simple accusation d'hérésie aurait suffi à enterrer les Werserian une bonne fois pour toutes. »
languages.original_text: "Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que cette maison est la plus faible de Dargonus, et sans la protection du sénéchal, elle aurait disparu depuis longtemps. La famille du gouverneur ne la porte pas non plus dans son cœur. Une simple accusation d'hérésie aurait suffi à enterrer les Werserian une bonne fois pour toutes. »
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: «Porque sin la protección del Senescal, esta casa es la más débil de todo Dargonus. Y tampoco es que sean santo de devoción del gobernador. Lo fácil habría sido enterrar a los Werserian por haber sido acusados de herejía».
languages.original_text: "Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."

traits.locale_text: «De no ser por la protección del Senescal, esta casa sería la más débil de todo Dargonus. Y tampoco es que sean santo de devoción del gobernador. Lo fácil habría sido enterrar a la familia Werserian por haber sido acusados de herejía».
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Denn wenn diesem Haus der Schutz des Truchsesses entrissen wird, ist es das schwächste auf ganz Dargonus. Und besonders die Familie des Gouverneurs kann das Haus nicht ausstehen. Es wäre leicht gewesen, die Familie Werserian unter Vorwürfen der Ketzerei zu begraben."
languages.original_text: "Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Ohne den Schutz des Truchsess wäre dieses Haus nämlich das schwächste in ganz Dargonus. Und besonders die Familie des Gouverneurs kann das Haus nicht ausstehen. Es wäre leicht gewesen, die Familie Werserian mit Vorwürfen der Ketzerei zu begraben."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Çünkü Seneşal'in korumasını çıkardığımızda Dargonus'taki en zayıf hane onlar. Ayrıca valinin ailesi de bu haneden hiç haz etmez. Werserianları kâfirlikle suçlamak, bu vaziyette gayet kolay olacaktı."
languages.original_text: "Because when stripped of the Seneschal's protection, this house is the weakest one on all of Dargonus. And they are also particularly disliked by the governor's family. It would have been easy to bury the Werserians under accusations of heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü Seneşal'in koruması olmadıkça Dargonus'taki en zayıf hanedir kendileri. Ayrıca valinin ailesi de bu haneden hiç haz etmez. Werserian hanesini kâfirlikle suçlamak bu vaziyette gayet kolay olacaktı."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback
